Package ulb.infof307.g9.model.database

Class DatabaseRanking

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g9.model.database.DatabaseRanking
public class DatabaseRanking extends Object
The DatabaseRanking class is used to handle the Ranking table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DatabaseRanking(boolean serverMode)
    This Constructor is used to create the Ranking table if it doesn't exist when you call the singleton for the first time.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseRanking

      public DatabaseRanking(boolean serverMode) throws DatabaseException
      This Constructor is used to create the Ranking table if it doesn't exist when you call the singleton for the first time. The Ranking table is used to store the scores. It contains the following fields: - deck: the name of the deck (PK) - user: the username of the user (PK) - score: the score of the user for this deck
      Parameters:
      serverMode - the server mode
      Throws:
      RankingException - when there is an sql error
      DatabaseException

  • Method Details

    • insertNewScore

      public void insertNewScore(String deckTitle, String username, int score) throws DatabaseException
      Insert new score in Ranking.
      Parameters:
      deckTitle - the deck
      username - the user
      score - the score
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - if the insertion fails or the Ranking already exists

    • getScore

      public int getScore(String deckTitle, String username) throws DatabaseException
      Get the score of a user for a deck
      Parameters:
      deckTitle - the deck title
      username - the username
      Returns:
      Ranking score or null if there was an error
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - if fetching the ranking failed

    • scoreExists

      public void scoreExists(String deckTitle, String username) throws DatabaseException
      Check if a score already exists for a user and a deck
      Parameters:
      deckTitle - the deck title
      username - the username
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - if there is no ranking

    • deleteScoreFromRanking

      public void deleteScoreFromRanking(String deckTitle, String username) throws DatabaseException
      Delete score of a user for a deck from Ranking.
      Parameters:
      deckTitle - the deck title
      username - the username
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - if deleting the ranking failed

    • modifyScore

      public void modifyScore(ulb.infof307.g9.model.database.DatabaseDeck databaseDeck, String deckTitle, String username, int score) throws DatabaseException
      Update a score or insert it if it doesn't already exist.
      Parameters:
      deckTitle - the deck title
      username - the username
      score - the score
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - if updating the ranking failed

    • getRankingFromDeck

      public List<RankRow> getRankingFromDeck(String deck) throws DatabaseException
      Gets the scores of all users for a deck, ordered smallest -> greatest.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck
      Returns:
      all scores
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - if fetching the ranking failed
